name: Anchor (pixierr)
description:
Hi! I'm Aline Hui, the creator of Anchor. 

It's my first complete game. I was in a bad state of depression. I kept feeling that I was about to float away... I thought it would be nice to have an anchor to pin me down in this chaos. So I made this game to make my own anchor(literally hahah). Surprisingly, the process of making Anchor is already like a therapy to me... 

Anyhooo.

Anchor has one and only mechanism: Press SPACE to drop the anchor and stop the time. This means that if you ever see a scene you enjoy just drop the anchor and it will stop changing. Some random weather will not be affected though. Press SPACE again to lift the anchor and resume changing.

1. DO NOT buy/play this game if you are looking for some adrenaline or so.
2. CONSIDER buy/play this game if you want some peace.

May you find your anchor.

Aline Hui
